text:
Full Stack Engineer - London, UK or REMOTE

Overleaf.com: We build awesome ways for scientists to collaborate and communicate. We're looking for full stack engineers â€” your projects will span our database (PostgreSQL), web app (Rails, Node), front end (React, Backbone) and infrastructure (Docker, Heroku, EC2, GCP) layers. We also have projects for mobile, if you're into Android or iOS.

To apply, go to https://www.overleaf.com/jobs or drop us a line a jobs@overleaf.com :)
